title: Advice to the maidens of London to forsake their fantastical top-knots; since they are become so common with Billings-gate women, and the wenches that cryes kitchin-stuff: together with the wanton misses of the town. To the tune of, Ye ladies of London. This may be printed, R.P.
author: Individuell människohjälp (Organization), artist.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed for J. Blare, at the sign of the Looking-Glass on London-Bridge,
